promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic legendary dragon electric-type pokemon with a ancient tail. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Thunderaxus, a a gigantic legendary dragon electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Lightning Slam, Steamroller. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "electric" or "Thunderaxus". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, dragon-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Known for inhabiting tempestuous landscapes, this colossal titan, Thunderaxus, wields Lightning Slam and Steamroller with unrivaled might. It controls thunderstorms, and is said to roll across the land like an unstoppable force.
